name: The Velocipede That Could
description:
Drive through a factory or caves, and go as far as you can without crashing! 2 more maps on the way, and cosmetics, maps, DLC, more are planned. This is the earliest prototype of the game. Hope to add better graphics and gameplay. Have fun and please support the project!

Controls:

Left/Right Arrows/Back or Forward

X/Front Flip

Z/Back Flip
